::Cerberus/Four Nightmares/Nemean Hydra::

    They all ducked. The Nightma=
res stopped at the site of the others leaving.
    Cerberus glared at the l=
eaving bots, "We could have the beginning of a Civil War here. I do not wan=
t that. First and formost we have to salvage the ship. The Weapon room is t=
he most important, that is where we will go first.
    "Sphink, please cont=
act any allies you might have, we will be needing a place to stay for the t=
ime being."
    Cerberus started walking towards the base. The Nightmares t=
ransformed to beast mode, in unison. Hydra transformed back to a lion, not =
really eager to shot off his Hydra form.
(Meaning Kit Kat's base)
